TextMetrics.summary: The TextMetrics interface represents the dimensions of a piece of text in the canvas; a TextMetrics instance can be retrieved using the method.

remarks.para:
-Creator method in
-The {{HTMLElement("canvas")}} element and its associated interface,

TextMetricsActualBoundingBoxAscent.summary: The read-only actualBoundingBoxAscent property of the interface is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the attribute to the top of the bounding rectangle used to render the text, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsActualBoundingBoxDescent.summary: The read-only actualBoundingBoxDescent property of the interface is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the attribute to the bottom of the bounding rectangle used to render the text, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsActualBoundingBoxLeft.summary: The read-only actualBoundingBoxLeft property of the interface is a double giving the distance parallel to the baseline from the alignment point given by the property to the left side of the bounding rectangle of the given text, in CSS pixels; positive numbers indicating a distance going left from the given alignment point.

TextMetricsActualBoundingBoxRight.summary: The read-only actualBoundingBoxRight property of the interface is a double giving the distance parallel to the baseline from the alignment point given by the property to the right side of the bounding rectangle of the given text, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsAlphabeticBaseline.summary: The read-only alphabeticBaseline property of the interface is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the property to the alphabetic baseline of the line box, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsEmHeightAscent.summary: The read-only emHeightAscent property of the interface returns the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the property to the top of the em square in the line box, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsEmHeightDescent.summary: The read-only emHeightDescent property of the interface returns the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the property to the bottom of the em square in the line box, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsFontBoundingBoxAscent.summary: The read-only fontBoundingBoxAscent property of the interface returns the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the attribute, to the top of the highest bounding rectangle of all the fonts used to render the text, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsFontBoundingBoxDescent.summary: The read-only fontBoundingBoxDescent property of the interface returns the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the attribute to the bottom of the bounding rectangle of all the fonts used to render the text, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsHangingBaseline.summary: The read-only hangingBaseline property of the interface is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the property to the hanging baseline of the line box, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsIdeographicBaseline.summary: The read-only ideographicBaseline property of the interface is a double giving the distance from the horizontal line indicated by the property to the ideographic baseline of the line box, in CSS pixels.

TextMetricsWidth.summary: The read-only width property of the interface contains the text's advance width (the width of that inline box) in CSS pixels.
